presentationTable.name: Facts - Opportunity Snapshot
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Open Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Opportunities in the system (Opportunity Status = Open)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Open Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Won Opportunities in the system (Opportunity Status = Won)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Lost  Opportunities in the system (Opportunity Status = Lost)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of No Sale Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total No Sale Opportunities in the system (Opportunity Status = No Sale)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of No Sale Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Competitive Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunities with atleast one Competitor
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Competitive Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Competitive Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Won Opportunities with atleast one Competitor
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Competitive Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Competitive Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Lost Opportunities with atleast one Competitor
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Competitive Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Competitive Open Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Opportunities with atleast one Competitor
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Competitive Open Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Competitive No Sale Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total No Sale Opportunities with atleast one Competitor
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Competitive No Sale Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Sales Accounts with Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Sales Accounts with Won Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Sales Accounts with Won Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: # of Sales Accounts with Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Opportunities (Opportunity Status = Open, Current Date greater than Opportunity Expected Close Date)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.# of Expired Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days to Close
presentationColumns.description: Average number of days to Close an Opportunity. This metric is computed as follows: Total days needed to close Opportunities/# of closed Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average # of Days to Close

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days to Open
presentationColumns.description: Average number of days the Opportunity is Open. This metric is computed as follows: Total days the Opportunity is Open/# of Open Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average # of Days to Open

presentationColumns.name: Average Opportunity Win Probability
presentationColumns.description: Average probability to Win the Opportunity. This metric is computed as follows: Total win probabilities/# of Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average Opportunity Win Probability

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Closed Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: Total Closed Opportunities Age/# of Closed Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average Age of Closed Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Won Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: Total Won Opportunities Age/# of Won Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average Age of Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Lost Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: Total Lost Opportunities Age/# of Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average Age of Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of No Sale Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of No Sale Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: Total No Sale Opportunities Age/number of No Sale Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Average Age of No Sale Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of No Sale Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Win Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Winning Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * Total Won Opportunities/Total Won and Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Win Rate

presentationColumns.name: Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Losing Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * Total Lost Opportunities/Total Won and Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Converting Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows:  100 * Total Won Opportunities/Total Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Conversion Rate

presentationColumns.name: Competitor Win Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Winning Competitive Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * Total Competitive Won Opportunities/Total Competitive Won and Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Competitor Win Rate

presentationColumns.name: Competitive Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Losing Competitive Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * Total Competitive Lost Opportunities/Total Competitive Closed Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Competitive Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Competitor Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: Rate of Converting Competitive Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * Total Competitive Won Opportunities/Total Competitive Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Snapshot.Competitor Conversion Rate
